GapFillInput.Title: So and neither
GapFillInput.Instruction: Type the correct answer in each gap.
GapFillInput.ContentGapFillInput:
1. A: I'm good at science.
B:I'm not. (disagree)
000
2. A: I always have breakfast.
B:So do I. (agree)
000
3. A: I don't speak Swahili.
B:I do. (disagree)
000
4. A: I'm not very fit.
B:Neither am I. (agree)
000
5. A: I can drive.
B:So can I. (agree)
000
6. A: I went to university.
B:So did I. (agree)
000
7. A: I can fly a plane.
B:I can't. (disagree)
000
8. A: I woke up early today.
B:I didn't. (disagree)
000
9. A: I didn't go out last night.
B:I did. (disagree)
000
10. A: I wasn't at school yesterday.
B:Neither was I. (agree)
